about_the_game:
Special Halloween-themed Skin for Grey Goop DLC Monster!
Kaiju-a-gogo is a strategy/action title featuring GIANT MONSTERS. The player takes on the role of a fledgling Mad Scientist who has built the first human-controlled Kaiju in the world. While your rivals race to catch up with your genius and build their own Kaiju to compete with you, you have a five-year-window to use your Kaiju to achieve TOTAL WORLD DOMINATION.
(requires the Grey Goop DLC, 'natch)
detailed_description:
Special Halloween-themed Skin for Grey Goop DLC Monster!
Kaiju-a-gogo is a strategy/action title featuring GIANT MONSTERS. The player takes on the role of a fledgling Mad Scientist who has built the first human-controlled Kaiju in the world. While your rivals race to catch up with your genius and build their own Kaiju to compete with you, you have a five-year-window to use your Kaiju to achieve TOTAL WORLD DOMINATION.
(requires the Grey Goop DLC, 'natch)

package_groups.title: Buy Kaiju-A-GoGo: Grave Goop Halloween Skin

short_description: Happy Halloween! Choose your giant monster! Tonight it's tricks AND treats as you dress your Kaiju up in its Halloween finest! Take of the world in style in this light action-strategy game that harkens back to the classic PC monster city-stomping games of yesteryear!
